agendas.name: Assassins
agendas.description: Track how many enemy Characters your units destroy

agendas.name: Behind Enemy Lines
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it ends the battle wholly within the enemy deployment zone, score 3 VP

agendas.name: Cull the Horde
agendas.description: Track how many enemy models your units destroy in melee

agendas.name: Kingslayer
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it destroys the enemy Warlord, it gains 2 XP

agendas.name: Reaper
agendas.description: Track how many enemy units your units destroy

agendas.name: Survivor
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it survives the battle at full strength, it gains 2 XP

agendas.name: Secure Objective
agendas.description: Select 1 unit - if it controls an objective marker at end of battle, score 2 VP

agendas.name: Priority Target
agendas.description: Select 1 enemy unit - if you destroy it, the destroying unit gains 2 XP

agendas.name: Domination
agendas.description: If you control more objective markers than your opponent at end of battle, score 3 VP

agendas.name: Glory Seekers
agendas.description: Track kills by each unit - units with 3+ kills gain 1 bonus XP
agendas.xpReward: 1 bonus XP for units with 3+ kills

agendas.name: Righteous Purgation
agendas.description: Track all enemy models destroyed by your army

agendas.name: First Blood
agendas.description: If you destroy the first enemy unit, that unit gains 1 XP
